FuncDef: The command prepends a BGP AS number once or numerous times to the AS path attribute of routes matching the route policy statement entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the AS number to prepend expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the number of times to prepend the specified AS number expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 50.
Specifies that the most recent AS number must be prepended to the AS-Path attribute of the route.
